oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-06-07 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 7, 1958. Featuring Ott Devine (announcer), Hawkshaw Hawkins (host/performer), guest performer Don Gibson, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 974th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hawkshaw Hawkins; Rod Brasfield; Don Gibson; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ott Devine introduces Hawkshaw Hawkins -- I'll Get Even With You (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Opening statement (Ott Devine, Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Don Gibson -- Oh Lonesome Me (Don Gibson) -- Prince Albert commercial (Ott Devine, T. Tommy Cutrer) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Tommy Jackson -- Forked Deer (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins talks -- It Is No Secret (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Chet Atkins -- Ain't She Sweet (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Devine, Ott, 1910-1994; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jackson, Tommy; Cutrer, T. Tommy; Hawkins, Hawkshaw, 1921-1963; Gibson, Don (Donald Eugene), 1928-2003
